ID.intro: ISAFE adalah laboratorium profesional di bawah PT Hastama Technologies Indonesia. Kami menyediakan layanan investigasi digital yang mematuhi standar hukum internasional. Data Anda adalah prioritas keamanan kami.

about.heading: Tentang ISAFE
body: ISAFE (Indonesia Security and Forensics Evidence Lab) didirikan sebagai respon terhadap meningkatnya kompleksitas kejahatan siber dan kebutuhan akan analisis bukti digital yang valid. Beroperasi di bawah naungan PT Hastama Technologies Indonesia, kami menggabungkan teknologi mutakhir dengan ahli bersertifikasi global.
Kami bukan sekadar penyedia jasa IT; kami adalah mitra strategis bagi penegak hukum, instansi pemerintah, dan korporasi dalam menghadapi tantangan era informasi.

vision.title: Visi
vision.text: Menjadi laboratorium referensi utama di Indonesia untuk forensik digital dan keamanan siber yang terpercaya, independen, dan berstandar internasional.

mission.title: Misi
items: Menyediakan layanan pemeriksaan bukti digital yang akurat dan dapat dipertanggungjawabkan (court-admissible).
Mengembangkan kapasitas SDM Indonesia melalui pelatihan keamanan siber berkualitas.
Melakukan riset berkelanjutan dalam teknologi investigasi digital.

hero.headline: Premier Digital Forensics & Cyber Security Laboratory
hero.subheadline: Uncovering digital evidence with scientific methodologies for law enforcement and corporations.

EN.intro: ISAFE is a professional laboratory under PT Hastama Technologies Indonesia. We provide digital investigation services compliant with international legal standards. Your data is our security priority.

about.heading: About ISAFE
body: ISAFE (Indonesia Security and Forensics Evidence Lab) was established in response to the increasing complexity of cybercrime and the critical need for valid digital evidence analysis. Operating under PT Hastama Technologies Indonesia, we combine cutting-edge technology with globally certified experts.
We are not just IT service providers; we are strategic partners for law enforcement, government agencies, and corporations in facing the challenges of the information age.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be the primary reference laboratory in Indonesia for digital forensics and cyber security that is trusted, independent, and internationally standardized.

mission.title: Mission
items: Provide accurate and court-admissible digital evidence examination services.
Develop Indonesia's human resource capacity through quality cyber security training.
Conduct continuous research in digital investigation technologies.

items.title: Digital Forensics
items.description: Data recovery and analysis services from various electronic devices for legal investigations.

points.title: Computer Forensics
points.desc: Hard drive and storage media analysis.

items.title: Cyber Security
items.description: Identification of security gaps and protection of your IT infrastructure before attacks occur.

points.title: Penetration Testing
points.desc: Cyber attack simulation to test defenses.

items.title: Training & Certification
items.description: Capacity building programs for institutions and individuals. Materials are curated by field practitioners.

items.title: Court-Admissible
items.description: Our reports are designed for validity in court.
